newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria first mass sell-off tender due in October.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria first mass sell-off tender due in October.

text.p: Bulgaria's Voucher Privatisation Tender Commission said on Friday the first tender would be held in October as part of the country's mass sell-off programme.

"Some 1,000 firms with a total capital of 90 billion levs ($392.7 million) will participate in the first voucher privatisation tender in October," the commission's chairman Yosif Iliev told a news conference.
He added that about 970 companies were ready to participate in the voucher privatisation so far.

The minimum price limit per share is expected to be 500 investment vouchers for 50 of the firms up for sale, up to 1,000 vouchers for a further 420 firms, up to 1,600 vouchers for 455 firms and above 1,600 for the remaining 50 firms.
The minimum price limits will be finalised next week. -- Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 981 4145 ($ = 229.2 Bulgarian Levs)
